whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.content: We are a creative and passionate team dedicated to making coding fun, accessible, and impactful for everyone.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.content: We provide mentorship, freelance opportunities, and community collaboration projects to empower developers of all levels.

ourTeam.title: Our Team
ourTeam.content: Our team consists of skilled developers, designers, and mentors committed to supporting growth and innovation.

ourGoals.title: Our Goals
ourGoals.content: Our mission is to celebrate creativity through technology and help every coder shine by building real-world, joyful solutions.
